targets.query: ("ET DNS" OR "ET INFO DNS Query for Suspicious") AND destination.ip:192.168.0.6 AND NOT soc.fields.requestMethod:GET AND NOT event.action:"Searching Elasticsearch" AND data_stream.dataset:suricata AND NOT "ET EXPLOIT MS-SQL SQL Injection closing string plus line comment" AND NOT source.ip:192.168.0.6 AND NOT source.ip:192.168.0.9 AND NOT source.ip:192.168.0.10

properties.value: Queries Forwarded to newpdc or ArcadiaDC
